text: Dancing With the Stars took an emotional moment to honor the victims of the 2017 Las Vegas mass shooting during Tuesday's Vegas - themed episode of the ABC competition. In addition to the Las Vegas - themed dances throughout the night, host Tom Bergeron addressed the deadliest mass shooting in modern U. S. history, which occurred on Oct. 1, 2017, in a short segment of the show. ` ` As we present tonight's show, we are aware that last night marked the one - year anniversary of the tragic shooting in Las Vegas,'' he said. ` ` The spirit of that incredible city lives on in the people of Las Vegas.
